lines.name: IVAN
lines.text: I will allow you to light myself on fire with my own sneezes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's what happens!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do not sneeze into the wind!

lines.name: IVAN
lines.text: (sneezes)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Is it called Fire Sneeze or Flaming Sneeze?

lines.name: IVAN
lines.text: It's called Fire Sneeze.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Based on the effects of this spell, I need you to--

lines.name: IVAN
lines.text: I keep sneezing for two rounds.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll a reflex save.

lines.name: IVAN
lines.text: All right!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Big money, no whammies!

lines.name: IVAN
lines.text: Seven!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Seven. Go ahead and roll 2d6 of fire damage as you glance over at the wizard, wink, go to sneeze and suddenly you catch yourself, close the mouth.

lines.name: IVAN
lines.text: Grizznak Snopstork signs off, everybody, as I consume myself in flames. And take ten damage.

lines.name: PHIL
lines.text: That's

lines.name: IVAN
lines.text: That's my good roll.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You sneeze yourself to death.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As smoke pours out, (yells) and falls onto the back. (sizzling) Unconscious, but smoldering at the moment.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, shit! That was nuts!

lines.name: IVAN
lines.text: Just to be clear, that puts me at negative one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Negative one. Mezek, you're up.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: This is not going super hot, guys.

lines.name: PHIL
lines.text: I told you to run!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The guy who's on fire, who's not doing well, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to run screaming at him. I'm going to (yells) throw one of my awful stars directly at him as I run straight up to him.

lines.name: PHIL
lines.text: Why not run

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Mid-run, you throw a star using your deadly aim.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I am using my deadly aim. That can't possibly go poorly. That's 18.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 18 hits. Go ahead and roll damage with the additional plus two damage for the deadly aim.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't have to roll damage, it's an auto. That's six points of damage. (yells)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He reaches up and pulls it out and a gout of blood goes (spraying). He's like (grunting) holding his longsword in one hand. "Stupid goblins!" As the flames are still burning around him. You move all the way up to him.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm straight up in their business.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ending your turn, we're back up to the top of the round. Browntooth, you're up.

lines.name: IVAN
lines.text: Drunken master.

lines.name: PHIL
lines.text: Now, I like you guys, I really do.

lines.name: IVAN
lines.text: But super run away?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They have no idea you're hiding.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You have the rock, don't you?

lines.name: PHIL
lines.text: Yep!

lines.name: IVAN
lines.text: Oh, that would be very goblin of you to just leave everyone to die and be the one that brings the boom-boom rock back to Guffeye.

lines.name: PHIL
lines.text: I would be her favorite. Especially if I were the only one left! I might get a drink with dinner! But first, I am going to shoot my light crossbow at the-- there's the flaming fellow--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right there. There's the paladin, and there's the cleric there. That's the bard.

lines.name: PHIL
lines.text: Should I finish off the big guy?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He's on fire.

lines.name: IVAN
lines.text: He's got blood coming out the side of his neck.

lines.name: PHIL
lines.text: I could reach all of them.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There's a bard, a cleric--

lines.name: PHIL
lines.text: The wizard has run off.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He's run off.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: You could try to finish off flame dude.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Whereabouts are you, Browntooth?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: He's behind that platform over yonder.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, he's the yellow circle.

lines.name: PHIL
lines.text: The cleric.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and roll for attack.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Ooh! 17 plus nine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, that definitely hits. Go ahead and roll damage with additional 2d6 sneak attack damage.

lines.name: PHIL
lines.text: Should I do them all at once?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, do them all at once.

lines.name: PHIL
lines.text: (grunts) Seven.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Seven points of damage to the cleric. The bolt strikes the back of the cleric's lower torso, the kidney area and she goes (grunts) and almost drops the holy symbol, catching it in the middle of the air, looks around. Make a stealth check to see if you manage to remain hidden this round.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 26. She glances around and doesn't know where it came from and is like (grunts). Are you going to move, or are you going to stay where you are?

lines.name: PHIL
lines.text: Stay where I am. Stupid goblins. Run! Leave!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That ends your turn. Snizzler, you're up, Piglet, you're on deck.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Seeing where Browntooth is, I'm like, he's got the right idea. I'm going to move up like to here. Over one. Yeah. Throw another bomb at the cleric. Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You lob it towards the cleric. Go ahead and roll for an attack.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Bombs! Boom boom! That's not good at all!

lines.name: IVAN
lines.text: It scatters!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, that's right, it does technically scatter. I'm going to let it scatter.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What'd you roll?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I rolled a four plus eight, so 12.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, 12, that's going to miss.

lines.name: IVAN
lines.text: It lands right on Grizznak, on his unconscious corpse.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's going to land right there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, perfect!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, that's six damage to all of them.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It is 11.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You take six fire damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You take three points.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I take zero because I have evasion.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fire! I continue my movement towards Browntooth.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I might go down, but I'm going to go down--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You're as close to a tank as a goblin can be.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: That's true.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Remember, your maximum hit points went up to what your rage score is.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh, that's right! 44?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Whatever it says.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah, 44.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you're raging, your hit points are up higher.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: That's right, so I'm not at 24 maximum hit points.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Keep that in mind. All right. That ends Snizzler's turn. You're up.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: There's no way I can take my hammer and hit multiple people? No?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, but because you're raging and you're in base to base with them, you can attack and bite.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay. I'm going to attack flame dude. With my normal attack.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and roll with your normal attack.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: 20 naturally, plus nine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Natural 20?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Golden snitch, motherfuckers!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll again to see if you can confirm critical. Roll another d20.

lines.name: IVAN
lines.text: Piglet MVP!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: 12 plus nine?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Plus nine? That's a critical hit! What's the damage multiplier on that?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Huh?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It should have a multiplier next to the weapon.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Times three.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll 3d10.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, plus six. 3d10 plus six damage.

lines.name: PHIL
lines.text: Are the zeroes tens?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh, zeroes are tens? 21 plus six. 26.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: How do you want to finish him off? Because you destroy him. So, the man who's on fire in front of you with his two weapons out.

lines.name: PHIL
lines.text: That's the one you hit?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: That's the guy. Damn it, I wish I had gone for the other one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: How do you want to finish him off? He's (heavy breathing).

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I hate the bard.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The bard?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Hit the bard in the head with his friend's head.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You swing as the fighter goes to parry your blow. Your goblin rage gets you a faster speed than he ever expected. As he goes to swing it to the side, the hammer comes straight across from the direction he wasn't expecting, like an unintentional feint. His eyes goes wide for a second before the hammer (slams) and the head gets carried off of his shoulders. It spins backwards, and the bard, who's singing his song, looks up as his friend's head towards him. Falls onto his feet and goes (yells). Makes a concentration. Fails his concentration. I'll say the song ends, he has to start it again because he just saw his friend's head land at his feet. He goes, "Valero? You!" You can see there is a genuine horror and sadness in his face.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I go: Yay!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You still have a bite attack!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I still have a bite attack!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, you do!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Who's by him?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is the paladin right here.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'll bite the paladin.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it. Roll for attack.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Cleric's right there.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Is that a six or a nine?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's a nine.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: That's a nine? Okay, so 13?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 13? Oh, the paladin? Yeah, it definitely misses the paladin. Her shield's too big. You go to bite her and she slams the shield out and you catch metal instead. She pulls the shield away and you scrape tooth marks against the metal, which is impressive for a goblin. She looks at you and goes, "You! You foul, terrible creature! You will pay for what you've done!" You see tears in her eyes. That ends your turn?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Maybe that's unwise, but I'm just going to stay there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's going to cast Sleep.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As part of the Sleep spell, just to double check what the saves are; I believe it's a will save. There we go, we got Sleep. Give me a second, guys. I need you to make a will saving throw.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: A will saving throw? Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You get plus two because you're raging.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Where is my--?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's on the third square on the right.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh, I see. Okay. 19.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With that, you look over as the bard ends up singing this incantation in a language you don't understand. You feel a wave of sudden sleepiness hit you. One of your eyes begins to sag, and then you (grunts) shake it off. Foam forming at the corner of your mouth. The bard goes (yelling).

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I go (blows raspberry).

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is a natural 20.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh no!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That ends the paladin's turn there. We're going to bring us to the cleric. The cleric is going to see how rough this is, circumstantially. She is looking over at the bombing one. Moves over here, turns to you and goes, "You will set nothing more ablaze, creature!" I need you to make a will saving throw.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Eh? What? Natural one. Again.

lines.name: IVAN
lines.text: You shouldn't even sit next to me.

lines.name: PHIL
lines.text: Your luck is rubbing off.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Grizznak, you're down to negative two.

lines.name: IVAN
lines.text: Yeah, negative two. Can I make a constitution check to see if I can stabilize?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and make a fortitude save.

lines.name: IVAN
lines.text: Fortitude save. Oh! 20!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're good. That ending your turn. Mezek, you're up.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to run up to the cleric who just paralyzed my friend. I'm going to run right up to him. Him, her, I don't actually know the right pronouns for the cleric.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You frog leap over the raging Piglet, and land.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And I (yells) and I open palm into the throat to use a stunning fist to try to silence her.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for an attack.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's a 15?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 15 hits! She doesn't have a huge armor class.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I said fist, I'm doing fist. That's five points of damage and needs to make a fortitude save.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Which she rolls a five, she does not.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: She is stunned for a round.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see a tooth go flying and her helmet gets set off. She pulls back. She drops the holy symbol in her hand, which now hangs from a chain, grabs at her head going (groaning) and is doubled over unable to gather her senses right now. Ending your turn there. Browntooth, you're up.

lines.name: PHIL
lines.text: Crossbow attack at the paladin.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Paladin? All right, go for it. Roll the attack for that one.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It's 14.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You haven't used your song yet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You haven't used your song yet, if you wanted.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Maybe this'll be the first time that it gets a better roll.

lines.name: PHIL
lines.text: Yes, this is the one time. And my life's not at stake. All right. I will sing my song.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What's your song?

lines.name: PHIL
lines.text: (sings) When Browntooth axe lifts up high, someone is about to die! Someone will bleed, lots will get bit, though I'd rather avoid direct conflict. I'm Browntooth the Rogue!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and reroll that as you steel yourself, locking in another bolt into the crossbow.

lines.name: IVAN
lines.text: Songs are cursed! All of our songs are cursed!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (singing) Goblin songs are cursed!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: People hate goblin songs.

lines.name: PHIL
lines.text: It's worse than K-Pop.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I got you a sad trombone for you, there.

lines.name: IVAN
lines.text: Yep. Deserve it.

lines.name: PHIL
lines.text: Man. At least I didn't die. No offense.

lines.name: IVAN
lines.text: None taken.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As the crossbow bolt goes off somewhere into the skyline, you're realizing perhaps the distance game isn't working for you. Might need to get up close and personal if you're going to land an attack here. Are you going to stay where you are?

lines.name: PHIL
lines.text: Is the church that way?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The church is up here. These are the steps to the church.

lines.name: PHIL
lines.text: I move over to the edge of the podium.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Over here?

lines.name: PHIL
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll to see if you can remain stealthed.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Ending your turn. Brings it to Snizzler. You're locked in place. Make a will saving throw to see if you can resist the effect of the Hold Person spell.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Just a straight will save?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Three.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How is that even humanly--?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Unable to shake the effect. You're still locked in place. Hand on the bomb. You're looking down at it. You were about to light it and your hand is hovering there and you're like (strains).

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I cast Methadone.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Piglet, you're up.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm going to rage. I'm going to attack the paladin.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can both hammer and bite.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm going to do both.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: 18 plus nine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits. Go ahead and roll the hammer damage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Roll that hammer damage!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: That is 12.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 12? Ooh! As you bring up and slam the hammer down, she pushes the shield up to block the blow, but the mallet catches over the top. The sheer weight of it pushes the shield away as it comes down and slams into the side of her chin. You can see the jaw breaks from the impact. A little bit of blood begins to trickle out of the corner of her mouth. She's like (pained grunting). She spits a glob of blood across her otherwise pristine silver armor.

lines.name: PHIL
lines.text: Seriously, she's all about cliches. Does she do this?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll for the bite attack.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: 18 plus four.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That also hits. Go ahead and roll damage.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: A d3 plus three.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll a d6, halve that, add three.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Four.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Four points of damage. As she's reacting from that and spits the blood out, looks down, you run up the side of her shield and bite into the chin you just broke and tear a chunk out of her face! She's like, (screaming) "Who does that?!"

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Piglet does, bitches!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That ends Piglet's turn. The bard, whose spell has been less than active, and the wizard who spent his last term in absolute horror of his friend, regains his senses and is going to step up.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh, I forgot about the wizard.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make another willpower save.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm raging, so it still applies, right? 18 plus three.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nothing is affecting you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Red Bull!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is a 22 to hit.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It hits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're still chewing the chunk of her face that's running around in your jaw, but the blade goes across the front of your torso, and leaves an opening that begins to spill dark, brackish, goblin blood. You don't even feel the pain. You're in such a furious bloodlust right now.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: So, next round might be my last round, guys.

lines.name: PHIL
lines.text: When we get down to two, I'm going to take off.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I got 11 hit points left.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The wizard's going to step forward now.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This round might be your last round.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: One arcs off at you while you're held in place.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, shit!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Snizzler, you take three points of force damage as two missiles arc off and slam into the sides of you from the arcane nature of the spell. That ends his turn. The cleric can't do anything, is stunned this round. Manages to shrug it off, but has absolutely no way of using any of her abilities because of the fist in the face she got from Mezek. Grizznak!

lines.name: IVAN
lines.text: (singing) I found a nest of baby birds.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Finishing that. Mezek, it's your turn.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to use my Flurry of Blows, with my quarterstaff, and I'm going to use Stunning Fist, again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Your last?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it! So you are doing two punches or two hits with your quarterstaff?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, Stunning First, is it fist or first?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Stunning Fist is as an attack; you can have it be a Stunning Fist attack.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So I'm going to (punching sounds). I'm going to use the quarterstaff.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So roll for that, see if it hits.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: For the Stunning Fist first; that's 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 20, that hits. Go ahead and roll damage on that. Rolls a seven.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's six points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Six points of damage and she is stunned again. Quarterstaff clocks her upside the head, now causing the armor to bend in on her temple and one eye has gone a little cross-eyed from the impact.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So I'm going to hit her again.

lines.name: PHIL
lines.text: Who'd you hit?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: They can't do another round of anything.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: That's true.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Hitting her again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's 12.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 12 total bonus?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: To hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She is currently flat-footed with the armor that's still 14, so yeah.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Is it time?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Reroll that. (singing) Mezek, Mezek the songs he is keen, so pour a pint of beer for me or I'll punch you in the spleen ugh!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Come on, this is our only chance!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yay! 19!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 19 hits, roll damage.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll use the flashy pink one. Oh, that's better! Eight points of damage, boom!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Eight points of damage, how do you want to finish off the cleric?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: You did it!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Quarterstaff one to the front and then I just want the quarterstaff to find a chink in the armor and just watch the head cleave with just stick. A big melty, awful cleave. Like, wood should not cleave.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: You should aim it at someone.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, after you slam her in the side of the head, stunning her, she leans forward from the impact. You spin the staff in one hand and then do a golf swing up the side of the head. You hit at such a way that you cause the bent metal of the helmet to act like a guillotine-like blade. With a (boomp) her head, up in the air, rolls on the ground, the bard who came up to ask for healing, "Heal me, Heal me!" and the body slumps down on the ground in front of him, and the head lands a second later.

lines.name: IVAN
lines.text: That's two heads for you!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And he rolls a one on his will save, he is currently horribly shaken by this experience and is having penalties from watching his two friends lose their head in the same battle.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Am I within quarterstaff contact of anyone else?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Currently the bard, yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to hit the bard. I'm going to spend my ki attack and hit the bard.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: About the time the adventuring party starts rethinking their career choices.

lines.name: PHIL
lines.text: Ooh, it's flashing baby!!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Natural 20!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll to confirm crit.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Come on, come on! Big money, no whammies!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 11. I'll say with the penalties he has suffered from watching his friends die, I'll say it just barely hits.

lines.name: IVAN
lines.text: Taliesin is MVPing this so hard.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: 14 points of damage. Straight stab.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: How do you want to do this to the bard?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I want to go straight through the mouth all the way through the skull and I want to hold it there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As he is screaming, the staff goes through, bursts out the back of the base of the spine where the brain connects and goes (gurgling). Blood dribbling down the side of his mouth, you hold him aloft.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Music to my ears! (laughs)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What do you do with the corpse at the end of the staff?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to hold it for my next attack on the next round.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, he is currently now held limp against your staff just being held aloft by your weapon.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh my god.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Absurd.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Fuck yeah!

lines.name: PHIL
lines.text: How many are left? Paladin and wizard?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There is the wizard and the paladin and they are both looking around themselves and wondering how these goblins steamrolled their adventuring party.

lines.name: PHIL
lines.text: And I'm still stealthed right? So this would be sneak attack?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As far as you know, yes.

lines.name: PHIL
lines.text: Crossbow at the paladin.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Crossbow to the paladin. Go for it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 19 hits. What is the critical range on the crossbow? Does it just say times something?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So roll again to see if it crits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll 2d6 plus sneak attack, so 4d6 damage total on this.

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Oh my god.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, Browntooth!

lines.name: IVAN
lines.text: Grizznak was the goblin sacrifice to Zarongel to make all of you succeed.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Holy shit!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: How do you want to finish the paladin? How do you want to do this, Phil? The paladin's back is to you, bearing down on Piglet now. Both bloodied and engaged in gladiatorial combat, this tiny goblin meat shield and this shielded piece of human meat.

lines.name: PHIL
lines.text: Does the paladin have a helmet?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She does, yes.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It's really up to you.

lines.name: IVAN
lines.text: Bard's dead, though, now. It wouldn't be funny unless you landed in the--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Still funny.

lines.name: PHIL
lines.text: Can I get to her ear?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: PHIL
lines.text: In one ear, out the other.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you aim carefully, you wait for her as the blows trade back and forth between her and Piglet. After the hit, she pulls back and spits off to the side and you can see the front of her face. As her head turns back, you use that moment to release and catch it right in the side of the helmet where the ear would be. The bolt out one side and gets partially out the other. She stands there for a second before (thud) to the knees, face first on the ground in the mud.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Man, left side of the table today. Table Right is just sucking it up. We don't need to be here, really.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Snizzler, make a will saving throw.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Even though she's dead, it doesn't just break?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thank you for the reminder.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Good work, Team Left! Yeah! Good work, Grizz, even though you're still unconscious.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is your turn.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Where is he at?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I see the wizard and I take a step back onto the platform right behind me. I take out my goblin bomb launcher.

lines.name: PHIL
lines.text: Is that a thing?!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It is now!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I go, all right! I arc it upwards and I go boof and aim for the wizard.

lines.name: PHIL
lines.text: Thankfully, he's far enough away that none of the rest of us will catch fire.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A cross between a bazooka and a large egg shell. She jams the bomb into it. As it detonates, it sends out a wave of smoke and ash. It blows apart and sets you on your feet from the impact of the launcher. Roll the attack, it doubles the range. That's just enough.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 18 does hit. His armor, with mage armor, of 16. Go ahead and roll damage on that. That's 2d6 plus three plus 1d4 because of your explosive feat.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Six plus three plus two, so 11 damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 11 points of damage and he is on fire. As he looks over and is like, "My friends. What?!" (explosion) He's screaming on fire.

lines.name: PHIL
lines.text: Water balloon from hell.

lines.name: IVAN
lines.text: Whee!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's Snizzler's turn. Piglet, you're up.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Wizard! I run.

lines.name: IVAN
lines.text: Wizard!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Leaping on top of the cart that is there before him.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: As expected, I rage. I'm going to do the Skullbreaker on him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it. Leaping in the air.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh no! That was terrible! 11.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He looks at you through the fire going, "No!"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Can you take a bite?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: No.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That finishes your turn, Piglet. Everyone else is dead. The wizard is in the flames going, "No!" and put out his hands like this and a gout of fire like a flamethrower bursts from the arcane energies. Go ahead and roll d6 fire damage, by the way.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Burn, wizard, burn! Another point of damage.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Man, that's going to be a bummer way to go out after I missed a hammer attack.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and make a reflex save, if you could.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Nine.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Plus your reflex save?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You take six points of fire damage.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm still alive!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Through the flames, more flames come. You burn, the cinders. What little bit of hair may have existed on you is gone. You are a charred, black mass of cracked goblin flesh and anger. You're enjoying being on the edge of death. That ends his turn. No one else is alive. You.

lines.name: IVAN
lines.text: Hi. I found the bird's nest!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Mezek, you're up.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I want to see if I can get enough of a pull to remove the head of the bard from the body and fling it as a projectile attack at the wizard.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're horrible!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm the worst person you know!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can use that. We're going to consider this an improvised ranged weapon. Go ahead and roll an attack with your dexterity bonus as opposed to your strength bonus. With a minus four, because you're not proficient in ranged improvised weapons. Just melee ones.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That'll work.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What's your dex modifier?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Four.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll a d20 and add three to it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Add three?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just your attack bonus.

lines.name: PHIL
lines.text: He's just making shit up!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 14 unfortunately misses. You look through the flames, he goes (heavy panting) and looks over as the bard head careens towards him and ricochets off his arcane armor. He goes (screaming).

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm running straight towards him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's being surrounded now. Browntooth.

lines.name: PHIL
lines.text: I can't reach him, can I? Can I shoot him?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Everyone else is dead, so you can get closer.

lines.name: PHIL
lines.text: Oh, that's true.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can move this way.

lines.name: PHIL
lines.text: I'll move up to the wizard.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can get there and see him off to the side.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He's flanked, also.

lines.name: IVAN
lines.text: Why didn't you run, wizard?

lines.name: PHIL
lines.text: Am I flanking him?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll a stealth to see if he sees you. He does not. He is so distracted with all his dead friends and being on fire, there's no way he can beat your stealth score with a six he rolled.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you're fine. Go ahead and roll an attack.

lines.name: IVAN
lines.text: Watch as Phil finishes off the final character for the night.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 16 just hits! Go ahead and roll. That is his AC with mage armor. Go ahead and roll 3d6.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 13. How do you want to do this?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Wow!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: On fire, looking aghast at the heroes slain around him.

lines.name: PHIL
lines.text: Nose?

lines.name: IVAN
lines.text: Nose.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Nose is good, we haven't done that.

lines.name: PHIL
lines.text: Right through his nose. Up the nose, into the brain.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's over there and he's like (heavy breathing). As he looks over, up to the sky, for the first time in his entire existence becoming a religious man. At the cathedral. The flames behind the cathedral from the mounting goblin hordes that are descending upon this square. He goes, "Why?" as the bolt strikes him right in the center. His eyes go wide and, slo-mo, (thud). The flames (sizzling) consuming the rest of his body on the ground.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Whoa! That was rad! Rad!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys can now hear the screams in the distance still growing louder. You can barely see the shadows of the Seven-Tooth goblin horde coming down the mountain, coming through the alleyway here.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Back to the sewers!

lines.name: PHIL
lines.text: Now can we go?!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hang on. Snizzler walks over and pours a Cure Light Wounds down.

lines.name: IVAN
lines.text: You had one this entire time?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Just one.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Power was with her all along.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You gain five hit points.

lines.name: IVAN
lines.text: Hey, guys. Did we win? Oh!

lines.name: PHIL
lines.text: Thanks for your help!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Dude, you were unconscious. It was so cool.

lines.name: IVAN
lines.text: Did anyone die in a really cool and very glorifying way?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, you did, man! It was awesome.

lines.name: IVAN
lines.text: Well, shit!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah! All right, let's go.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: We run.

lines.name: IVAN
lines.text: Also, before I leave, goblin dickbutt, goblin dickbutt.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Every corpse is marked appropriately with your victory token of the goblin dickbutt.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: As they go down into the sewer, I'm going to be the last one and I'm going to take my last bomb launcher. I'm going to aim for the church.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm so proud of you.

lines.name: IVAN
lines.text: That's the best!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughing) Roll an attack!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: In the sushi again! Ooh! 21.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (explosion) You see an explosion as flames begin to burn up on the long tapestries that hang in the front of the temple. Inside, you see two people that were hiding in the temple from the goblin hordes come running out on fire just as the goblin hordes round the corner and go (screaming) and rush and start striking them down, stabbing them repeatedly with their blades. The rest of the temple begins to catch flames as it licks out the sides of the now-shattering stained glass. You nod your head proudly before you dart back into the sewer after your friends.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Grizz.

lines.name: IVAN
lines.text: What's this?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: This is my art.

lines.name: PHIL
lines.text: (singing) Amazing Grace.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (singing) How sweet the sound!

lines.name: IVAN
lines.text: I'm so proud of you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Thank you, man. It's beautiful.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys your way out of what remains of the town of Sandpoint. Heroes left scattered across the center of the festival grounds. Make your way all the way back to your home.

lines.name: PHIL
lines.text: All right, now I'm glad I didn't run away.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Aren't you? That was pretty sick.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You head past to the west side of the Devil's Platter Mountains to the home of where your--

lines.name: PHIL
lines.text: Old Guffeye.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She spins around. "You! You've returned! And do you "bring me the promised stone?"

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Well, I helped a lot! But--

lines.name: PHIL
lines.text: I brought the stone!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Give me it. Give it to me."

lines.name: PHIL
lines.text: I hand to her.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As she pours you all your evening's meal of boom-boom stone soup, you recount the tales of the horrible slaughter that befell those who walked in your path. You realize you managed to bring back a trench coat as part of your victory prize.

lines.name: PHIL
lines.text: Stir in a little bit of dried meat with it.

lines.name: IVAN
lines.text: We throw it on top of our trophy pile.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And an empty snuff box tin.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And some poo and some bottles for molotov cocktails.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A masterful bounty you've collected this evening.

lines.name: IVAN
lines.text: I cast Grease on all of us.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Slip'n'Slide!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thank you all for watching this wondrously chaotic goblin spree that transpired. Big round of applause for our players this evening. You did amazing.

lines.name: PHIL
lines.text: Pure, unadulterated Id.

lines.name: IVAN
lines.text: Seriously, #TeamLeftSide. For all of the deaths you dished out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We're rolling for the grand prize winner right now. While they're doing that, I don't know if you're aware, but you systematically slaughtered the Iconic Heroes of the Pathfinder universe.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: That's their actual stats and everything?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh my god.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The ones that are always in the books?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: In the books, yeah!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: That's amazing!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The actual Pathfinder Iconic characters!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We killed Pathfinder!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yay! We murdered it!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: These people, yeah!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I was prepared to go down in a blaze of glory.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah, me too! I thought we were all going to die.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: For those who weren't aware, the Attack on Sandpoint is actually the very first encounter adventure in The Rise of the Runelords campaign setting and adventure guide for Pathfinder. You guys played the other half of that battle. What's normally the first fight for the heroes, they got slaughtered by five goblins.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: So this merry band of people came together, are like, "We're going adventuring!" Their first day out, they fight a group of goblins that beheaded all of them.

lines.name: IVAN
lines.text: In an alternate dimension, we TPKed another Pathfinder game.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Congratulations, we are the darkest timeline.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Somewhere, there's a whole new set of gamers being like, "This RPG shit's bullshit. I "died at level two. It was stupid. I'm over it."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well done, guys.

lines.name: IVAN
lines.text: Thank you, Matt!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Thank you, Matt! Amazing!

lines.name: PHIL
lines.text: I felt like I was in another world!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So they get these cool little goblin things, and this cool stuffies?

lines.name: IVAN
lines.text: It's all books, and all stuff.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All these little goblin things are available on the Paizo store, guys. The banks look awesome.

lines.name: IVAN
lines.text: The banks are cool.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's good desk accessories.

lines.name: IVAN
lines.text: As a sidebar statement, I would like to say that even though 17k and Ivan breathes fire, I don't know if we hit 17k or not. Oh, we did? This is not fortuitous. I will not actually light myself on fire.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Have you actually ever breathed fire before?

lines.name: IVAN
lines.text: Yeah! I do it a lot, but I'm not going to sneeze fire and then light myself on fire.

lines.name: PHIL
lines.text: Sneezing fire is different than breathing fire.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Sneezing fire would blow my mind. I've never seen that before.

lines.name: IVAN
lines.text: Different orifices.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is Ivan breathing it, not Grizznak.

lines.name: PHIL
lines.text: Grizznak really is lucky to be alive. He literally died three times.

lines.name: IVAN
lines.text: I actually was hoping that you guys would leave me there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Technically, I wouldn't. Well, you're my homie, it's fine.

lines.name: PHIL
lines.text: If we had to carry you? No.

lines.name: IVAN
lines.text: If you carried me, I would have expected you to throw me in the stew to have for the rest of the evening with the boom-boom stone.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well done, guys.

lines.name: PHIL
lines.text: Whose dice are these?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We got a winner?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: PacManWakkaWakka. Grand prize winner. You're going to get a fantastic care package courtesy of Paizo that involves Pathfinder Core Rulebook, Monster Codex, Inner Sea Races Book, Burnt Offerings Book, We Be Goblins, the goblin promo figure, the challenge square flip mat, which you got to see right here, goblin bank, plush, and a one-year subscription to Syrinscape. That is fantastic, congratulations!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And a one-year subscription to Syrinscape?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That was some good music. I really liked the drum one. The tribal one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Great music tracks. You can customize your own tracks.

lines.name: IVAN
lines.text: The sewers were great.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The screaming people were great.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There was a bar brawl in case you guys used a bar brawl as a way to get through. Here's the tavern brawl. Go ahead and hit that there.

lines.name: IVAN
lines.text: Awesome.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can put in glass shattering punches.

lines.name: IVAN
lines.text: Syrinscape also has not just a fantasy division, but they also have an entire sci-fi catalogue, too. I know we used it a bunch on the TMNT.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (Wilhelm scream)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh my god, they have a Wilhelm!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Wilhelm is on the sound list there. You have a dragon if you want to use it. It's the best bar brawl ever. Sad trombone, which we got to use earlier.

lines.name: IVAN
lines.text: All things you want while your players are doing stupid things.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's really cool stuff. If you have spells, like a fire spell, which you didn't get to hear over the music when you burst into flame last time.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Did you do it, though?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This, by the way, is what an evening at Matt Mercer's house is like. He's sitting going, "Look at this!" (trombone)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I make the sounds happen!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Add YouTube and that's pretty much it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, we don't do a lot when we have the opportunity.

lines.name: IVAN
lines.text: It was a pleasure being unconscious for most of the battle. Thank you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You did so much early on.

lines.name: PHIL
lines.text: You tried to talk us out of our mission.

lines.name: IVAN
lines.text: I did so enjoy all of the wayward things.

lines.name: PHIL
lines.text: That's not it!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Just think, you might have lived if you hadn't taken that bramble damage. I just want you to live with that. Sleep like a baby tonight. I want you to sleep like a baby.

lines.name: IVAN
lines.text: That's going to keep me awake, you asshole.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You're welcome.

lines.name: IVAN
lines.text: You know what? Suck it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Live with it.

lines.name: PHIL
lines.text: How much ass would we have kicked if

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I got the one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You got one.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Thank god. That would have been really depressing if none of the songs worked.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I roll really well.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We all sang our song once.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Everyone got to sing their song once, which is cool.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I wrote mine on my lunch break today.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys were awesome. Thank you guys so much for watching. Thank you guys for playing. You guys should come Thursday at 7:00pm to see the 50th episode of Critical Role.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's going to be crazy.

lines.name: IVAN
lines.text: Feel free to stick around next Monday.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Every Monday!

lines.name: PHIL
lines.text: Every Monday in the week?

lines.name: IVAN
lines.text: Every Monday, and it sucks because I won't be there next week because of Tabletop and for the next three weeks, but you'll see we'll be playing Kick Ass and Chew Bubblegum next week. It's a fun little one-off. You have two actions. You can either chew bubblegum or you can kick ass.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's fantastic.

lines.name: IVAN
lines.text: If you ever run out of bubblegum, you can only kick ass.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What happens if you run out of kicking ass?

lines.name: IVAN
lines.text: You can't ever run out of kicking ass.

lines.name: PHIL
lines.text: There's always ass to kick. But bubblegum is finite.

lines.name: IVAN
lines.text: If you ever want to explore the weird and wacky RPGs and explore small campaigns, not unlike this scenario in little chunks, tune in Monday.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You should run a Hole game sometimes.

lines.name: IVAN
lines.text: What's that? Hole's on my list.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I love Hole.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He got me the Hole books for my birthday a couple years ago. And all the expansions.

lines.name: IVAN
lines.text: We also want to play Tune. Do you know Tune?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't know Tune.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't know Tune?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, Tune! Yes.

lines.name: IVAN
lines.text: Tune's basically Saturday morning cartoon show, the role-playing game.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I've been trying to dig up Tofos for you, too.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Like Who Framed Roger Rabbit, the RPG?

lines.name: IVAN
lines.text: Basically.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: That sounds really cool.

lines.name: IVAN
lines.text: There's a lot of really fun systems out there. A lot of them don't get a lot of attention because they're either independently published or whatever, but we find them and have a good time with them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's what No Survivors is about.

lines.name: IVAN
lines.text: It's called No Survivors because characters can die and it's okay. Anyway. Thank you, Matt.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thank you, guys. No Survivors, every Monday here, 7:00pm, Critical Role every Thursday at 7:00pm. Thank you guys so much for coming. Have a wonderful night, and we'll see you Thursday. Bye!
